metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8399 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
PCRE2 before 10.30 has an out-of-bounds write caused by a stack-basedbuffer overflow in pcre2_match.c, related to a "pattern with very manycaptures."

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8399` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpcre2-16-0 - 10.31-2
libpcre2-32-0 - 10.31-2
libpcre2-8-0 - 10.31-2
libpcre2-posix0 - 10.31-2
pcre2-utils - 10.31-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pcre2 package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '10.31-2').
